scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rimraf out && next build && next export && touch out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out -t true
scripts.build-export: bash -c 'rm -fr ../jazzyears.github.io/{404.html,_next,index.html,posts} && npm run build && npx next export && cp -a out/. ../jazzyears.github.io'
